div.p: Our corporate wellness sector is dedicated to delivering powerful & effective tools and techniques based on wellness, stress management, work life balance, to enhance productivity & happiness! Illuminations aim to create a culture of success and happiness, by focusing on the individualâ€™s physical, mental and emotional well-being in order to achieve optimal results in their performance in the workplace! We offer executive wellness packages where we combine a range of our services to provide your company a complete 360% solution to managing stress.
